```{r}
m1_covariates_only = lm(g_factor ~ sibling_count_uterus_alive_factor + birthyear + male, data = alldata_birthorder)
m1_covariates_only = lmer(g_factor ~ sibling_count_uterus_alive_factor + birthyear + male + (1 | mother_pidlink), data = alldata_birthorder)
```


### Basic model {.tabset}

#### Model summary
```{r}
summary(m1_covariates_only)
```

#### Coefficient plot
```{r}
plot(allEffects(m1_covariates_only))
```

### Add covariates {.tabset}

#### Model summary
```{r}
m2_birthorder = update(m1_covariates_only, formula = . ~ . + birthorder_uterus_alive_factor)
summary(m2_birthorder)
```

#### Coefficient plot
```{r}
plot_birthorder(m2_birthorder, separate = FALSE)
```

### Add interaction {.tabset}

#### Model summary
```{r}
m3_interaction = update(m2_birthorder, formula = . ~ . - birthorder_uterus_alive_factor - sibling_count_uterus_alive_factor + count_birthorder_uterus_alive)
summary(m3_interaction)
```

#### Coefficient plot
```{r}
plot_birthorder(m3_interaction)
```

### Model comparison
```{r}
anova(m1_covariates_only, m2_birthorder, m3_interaction)
```
